content: lion brand pattern # cpl-bafg skill level beginner level 1 pound of love® article #550 1 ball crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm pattern is a multiple of 3 stitches the hood is worked separately crocheted to the blanket to finish also available on joann com p480978 crochet hooded baby blanket 1 see hooded baby blanket knit 2 for the knit version *free registration at site required to access pattern * 1 http //www joann com/crochet-hooded-baby-blanket/p480978 html 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/hooded-baby-blanket-knit
